entries.abort: You are leaving us to the mercy of these pirates! What are you thinking? Your superior will hear of this failure!
entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for mission transports. Stand by for location.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We have a lock on our transport. Intercept and recapture our ship.
entries.capture_complete: Autopilot under Imperial control. Stand by to escort freighter to HQ.
entries.capture_phase_1_1: Do you know who I work for? No! Well if you did you wouldn't do it.
entries.capture_phase_1_2: What are you doing to my computer system?
entries.capture_phase_1_3: I will never be taken alive! Hmmm...on second thought I will come along peacefully.
entries.capture_phase_1_4: This is private property! Granted it was private property before we stole it, but that still doesn't make what you are doing right.
entries.capture_phase_1_5: Hey, what are you doing to my Nav computer?
entries.capture_phase_2_1: You might have control over my ship but you will never have control over me.
entries.capture_phase_2_2: The Red Skulls will not stand for this.
entries.capture_phase_2_3: I thought the Empire was fair and just...you have shattered my dreams.
entries.capture_phase_2_4: I can't control my ship! You have done something to my computers!
entries.capture_phase_2_5: One day I shall get my revenge.
entries.complete: We have the Red Skull freighter. Its cargo bay is full of our stolen property. Nice work, pilot.
entries.complete_1: We have the Red Skull freighter. Its cargo bay is full of our stolen property. Nice work, pilot.
entries.complete_2: We have the Red Skull freighter. Its cargo bay is full of our stolen property. Nice work, pilot.
entries.complete_3: We have the Red Skull freighter. Its cargo bay is full of our stolen property. Nice work, pilot.
entries.complete_4: We have the Red Skull freighter. Its cargo bay is full of our stolen property. Nice work, pilot.
entries.complete_5: We have the Red Skull freighter. Its cargo bay is full of our stolen property. Nice work, pilot.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <%TO enemy escorts remaining.>
entries.failed_destroy: I thought your orders were clear, pilot. You were to recapture that ship not destroy it. Return to your superior.
entries.failed_escape: Your incompetence let that ship get away. That is a huge set back for the Empire. Report your failure to your superior.
entries.panic_1: Yes! My friends are here to punish you. Wait! Why are they targeting me?
entries.panic_2: Prepare to pay the price of crossing the Red Skulls.
entries.panic_3: No, don't shoot at me! I am on your side.
entries.panic_4: Here comes the Red Skulls. Now you are in big trouble.
entries.panic_5: Yes! My friends are here to punish you. Wait! Why are they targeting me?
entries.quest_disable_d: Once the Freighter is located, disable it by targeting the freighter's engines or other sub-systems in order to bring it to a complete halt.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the freighter back to Imperial space. It is highly possible that the Red Skulls will try to recapture or destroy the freighter rather then to let it passively fall into Imperial hands. Be alert and ready to defend your prize.
entries.quest_location_d: The Red Skulls have stationed themselves in the Endor system. The transports are attempting to leave this system for parts unknown. You need to intercept these freighters before they can leave the area.
entries.quest_recover_d: Move in close to the disabled freighter and wait for the capture operation to begin. You have been supplied a program that will automatically reconfigure the freighters Nav computer to only accept coordinates sent in by Imperial Flight Control. This process may take a few minutes to begin.
entries.recovery_success: Excellent job, pilot. That ship was vital to the Emperor's plans for this system. Report back to your commanding officer.
entries.target_disabled: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Targets engines disabled. Begin docking procedures.>
entries.taunt_1: If we can't have that freighter, no one can.
entries.taunt_2: You are good, but not good enough.
entries.taunt_3: I have a prediction that in the end you are going to be nothing more then space junk.
entries.taunt_4: You don't actually think you can win, do you?
entries.taunt_5: It's time for me to show you what I can do.
entries.thanks_1: Next time, Imperial dog. Next time.
entries.thanks_2: More will come and they will rescue me this time.
entries.thanks_3: You should just leave before more of my friends show up.
entries.thanks_4: I have an idea. I will split my cargo with you...how does that sound?
entries.thanks_5: You are just making them mad.
entries.title: Endor System: Capture the Red Skull Freighter Duty
entries.title_d: The Empire wants the property that the Red Skulls have hijacked from its freighters in the Endor system. You are to intercept the Red Skull transports, capture them, and escort them back to Imperial space.
